title: Simple planting plan
text: Simple planting plan. We follow safety steps in the barn. In winter we protect equipment from freezing. This is my routine at the dairy farm. Veterinary biosecurity keeps the herd healthy. Sprayer calibration prevents over application. I adjust irrigation when the soil is dry. Farm safety rules are part of our routine. We rotate pastures to improve forage quality. We record yields and monitor feed intake. I use simple tools for daily tasks. Irrigation is scheduled to reduce water waste. We start work before sunrise during harvest. The tractor needs a safety check before operation. The greenhouse helps control temperature and humidity.
